metadata.title: CVE-2016-9263 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: WordPress through 4.8.2, when domain-based flashmediaelement.swf sandboxingis not used, allows remote attackers to conduct cross-domain Flashinjection (XSF) attacks by leveraging code contained within thewp-includes/js/mediaelement/flashmediaelement.swf file.

criterions.comment: wordpress: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
